name: Enchanted Fairytale Jewel
description:
DESCRIPTION
True freedom lives halfway between Paris and Burgundy! You are free... Free to welcome your guests to an exclusive location and to settle into the château and its rooms one day in advance... Free to celebrate your union at the local church or in the rose garden... Free to dance until dawn, to go for a night-time swim amid the palm trees and to invite your guests to stay on for brunch the day after the reception. Even caterers and other services can be yours to choose. Make your dreams come true and enjoy a positively liberating rental experience.
Brides and grooms who have chosen this venue as their wedding venue since 1990 are welcome to come back and visit if they are staying in the area. The wealth of their cultures, their traditions and their love have strengthened our resolve to restore life to this Renaissance Jewel and so we have been able to bring the chateau's architecture and its festive traditions back to life. The Château has very fond memories of all his bride grooms. And we hope that you will soon be part of them by choosing this as your chateau.
This Chateau is a Renaissance gem, just one hour south of Paris that offers you 4 big halls and 28 bedrooms for your wedding needs. The Chateau also boasts a heated pool, tennis court, sound system until dawn, the caterer of your choice and exclusive chateau hire for 2 or 3 days with no time restrictions. So why not celebrate in the elegant footsteps of the Princes and Princesses.
We couldn’t think of anywhere better to celebrate your wedding than in a romantic French historical monument located between Greater Paris and Burgundy, making it perfectly accessible to all your destination guests.
You may already be familiar with our “Nights of Fire” winter promotion €20 880 inc. TTC. The entire estate can be yours, exclusively, for 2 days and 1 night (3pm on Saturday to 3pm on Sunday) or for 3 days and 2 nights in the week. The grounds are lit up with torches and are equipped with a sound system. All areas (Grande Galerie, Salle des Tentures, Music Room, Riad, Walled Garden Rose Garden, Swimming Pool, Tennis Court, and the 28 rooms and suites) are just for you with a pilote until dawn!
For any event from 15 March to 30 April and October, this price is €24 000 HT TTC, so €27 840 inc. TTC.
In the summer, the price is €27 000 HT TTC so €31 320 inc. TTC in all exclusivity for an entire chateau.
We are here to help with any questions you may have on the venue and we look forward to sharing our venue with you!
additional_info:
FEATURES
Golf course nearby
Helicopter Pad
Internet access
Baby friendly (cots, changing facilities)
Pet friendly
Disabled access
Tennis court
Swimming pool
Chapel on site
Recommended suppliers list available
Nearest Airport
Breakfast included
